evidence.claim: Nuance utilizes AWS and Azure for deploying healthcare solutions.
Nuance supports FHIR standards for healthcare interoperability.
Nuance's products integrate with various EHR systems and employ HL7 protocols.
Nuance employs Snowflake for data warehousing solutions in the healthcare sector.
Nuance healthcare solutions utilize Kafka for real-time data streaming.

icp.icp_reason: Nuance Healthcare integrates X12 EDI for healthcare data exchange, aligning with ICP profile.
matched_use_cases: EDI Data Exchange with Payers and Providers
